settings.title: pH Perfect Grow
settings.description: Advanced Nutrients pH Perfect technology has the added benfit of keeping your soils pH in balance. Many don't realize the importance of this. As well as the challenge of testing and maintaining a soils balance.

settings.title: pH Perfect Bloom
settings.description: Boveda not only knows 2-way humidity control for packages and containers - they invented it. Their patented humidity control packs regulate moisture content, keeping the contents of your containers at the perfect desired level. They don’t need any activation or maintenance. Just place them in an airtight container with your items, and Boveda technology will do the rest.

settings.title: 20 Pack Nitrile Gloves
settings.description: The world’s first 100% nitrile disposable glove, N-DEX 7005 provides unmatched dexterity and performance across a range of tactical applications using revolutionary SHOWA technology.

settings.title: Kits for Harvesting
settings.top-of-page: Your plants have three main phases in their life cycle. Each has different nutrient requirements. In order to maximize your plants potential, they need to be fed the right nutes for each phase. If you are new to growing, we suggest a simplified approach by choosing one of our kits below.
